title: Clone the MultiGov repository
content: Download the [codebase](https://github.com/wormhole-foundation/multigov) and navigate to the appropriate folder (`evm` or `solana`).

title: Set up your project
content: Install the required toolchain for your target network. Use Foundry or Anchor for EVM, Solana CLI and Rust for Solana.

title: Configure environment variables
content: Set deployment parameters in a `.env` fileâ€”such as RPC URLs, private keys, and hub settings.

title: Deploy contracts or programs
content: Use scripts to deploy the hub (EVM only) and spoke components (EVM or Solana) to your target networks.

title: Initialize governance parameters
content: Configure vote thresholds, quorum, metadata, and authorities to activate governance.
